docs.title: Welcome to Random Blog
docs.text: This is a random blog. More content to be added.

docs.title: Random Blog
docs.text: Just a random blog, but I hope to write something helpful and meaningful.

docs.title: Tech
docs.text: Built with Mkdocs and Material for MkDocs.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Test for formula
docs.text:
\[ a = \frac{1}{2} \sum_{\sigma}\mathbb{I} \]

The homomorphism \(f\) is injective if and only if its kernel is only the singleton set \(e_G\), because otherwise \(\exists a,b\in G\) with \(a\neq b\) such that \(f(a)=f(b)\).

docs.title: Test for codes
docs.text:
def f(n):
return n * f(n-1) if n > 1 else 1
print(f(3))

(define (f x)
(if (x > 1)
(* x (f (- x 1)))
1))
